ISSUE.TITLE: Scala 2.11 support
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Looked great, and I started setting up Drone for my projects. But then I realized that only Scala 2.9 is supported! Sadly I had to pull myself out of using Drone. :( Can you please start support for Scala 2.11?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [maint] exit code added in error type (#1006)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [code-1016] Replacing gitea commands with new command package (#1003)
